name: Chain the Rapper
description:
This was the end result after taking part in the Brains Eden 2019 game jam. The theme was "chain reaction"

the idea of the game is that you "chain" words together to get a "reaction" from the crowd.

Each sentence is a timed button press where you must pick a Rhyme. The more Rhymes that match, the higher the score! Press the button when the green bar reaches the blank space.

This was the end result of two days of crunch working in a team with several other students.
Their GitHubs:
 https://github.com/TheRensei
https://github.com/chrisington
https://github.com/jSplunk

the project itself can be viewed at: https://github.com/jSplunk/ChainRapper
(please note that the contributors for each commit may not necessarily be the person who created that work)
